snippet: Total ad spending climbed 7.1 percent compared with the same period a year ago, according to a report from Kantar Media, part of WPP. The report closely tracks a report from Nielsen released days earlier.
abstract: Total ad spending climbed 7.1 percent compared with the same period a year ago, according to a report from Kantar Media, part of WPP. The report closely tracks a report from Nielsen released days earlier.

headline.main: More Evidence of Strong 3rd Quarter for U.S. Ad Spending
